nodes.text: Darth Andru's tomb was a tomb constructed for the Sith Lord Darth Andru on the planet Dromund Kaas. Located west of Kaas City, the tomb was at the edge of the Kaas City expansion district, and was visited several times by the Sith Lord Kallig.
By the time of the Cold War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and Galactic Republic, Darth Thanaton was known to lead Sith he despised here in order for them to be killed by Darth Andru's spirit.
